{{City_Infobox|title1 = Cobbleville|image1 = IMG 2529.JPG|caption1 = Cobbleville market as of 2018|population = 0|founded = 1876|size_in_blocks = About 1000x1000|mayor = Noone|city_slogan = Nothing}}Cobbleville is one of the biggest ruins in Minecraftia. It was a normal peaceful little town until 1998 when entity 303 obliterated the entire town except a few players, [[AkselHolmsted]] being one of them. Cobbleville is just one of the many villages that got destroyed when entity 303 went on a killstreak in 1998, but is the biggest one. Now, it's a popular destination for tourists and explorers.
'''Story'''
The village was founded in 1876 and slowly became a medium-sized town. But during an unknown night during 1998, entity 303 bursted out of the nearby mine. Entity 303 ran over the fields. And set fire to the town hall. I was not long before the entire city stood in flames. 5.900 people died that night. As soon as entity 303 was done with cobbleville he continued to the next town, Plankstown. Meanwhile a few lucky players made it to safety. That was when the citys TNT depot caught on fire and blew half the city up. [[File:IMG 2524.JPG|thumb|300x300px|'''Cobbleville before getting destroyed''']] [[File:Fallen creeper.PNG|thumb|220x220px|'''Cobblevilles creeper monument 20 years later''']] [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Destroyed Locations]]

From the destroyed buildings, ruined test chambers, and smashed paintings, rose a new clan...
[[File:Nether.jpg|left]]
==Origin== The Combine was formed almost immediately after the fall of Aperture Science, deep under the surface of Minecraftia, below the test chambers and offices. In a time of desperation, the CEO of Aperture, Jose Furnace, fled from the conflict and into a Nether Portal. The scientists soon followed. Unfortunately, the exit portal had been smashed by a Ghast, and the scientists were forced to build a new civillization below the world. They mined tunnels of Netherrack, smelting them into a strong Nether Brick. With the Nether Brick, they began building a massive fortress and claimed it under the name of the Combine.
More to be added. [[Category:Craftian Groups]] [[Category:Locations]]

== Characteristics == Cookiesforme has an odd obsession with cookies, so much that his entire mansion is made out of cookies, eats nothing but cookies and his bed is made out of cookies. Cookiesforme is one of the wealthiest players, having a huge amount of diamonds, gold and emeralds [[Category:Players]] [[Category:Stories]]

To build this door you need two sticky pistons and the blocks of your choice. Place the two pistons facing toward you directly on top of each other. Then place two blocks of your choice on the sticky part of the piston. You will want to put the pistons and blocks so that they are right before your door. Place two blocks of your choice next to the pistons and then put two switches on the blocks one above the other. And there you are! [[Category:Fan Creations]]

CosmicMuffin736 is a Minecraft YouTuber and Clan Fighter. He was in long range of clans and has a large array of different YouTube channels. His skin varied from many different skins.
==Clans==
==Coke==
Coke was the first clan Cosmic was in. He worked along side Nayiby15, Jmz09, StandByWarShark, XxTigoon39xX, and ICroatia4Life. This was his first time in a clan and he was very stressed about it. Coke was in various different clan battles. At the time him and AshKlan weren't friends but they hated each other. Coke and the Manhunters (Ash's clan group)fought many times. Even destroying the Central Bank of Minecraftia. Forcing him to leave Coke.
==117==
After leaving Coke for almost two years, Cosmic formed a new clan titled 117. 117 contained ReplacedLemon0, AntiSkullCam, EpiclyJaica, and FreedomAdam. At this time he signed a peace treaty with the Manhunters and they went their separate ways. During this time was when Coke recruited new people and he left 117 to run from his past clan.
==LiveStorm==
Cosmic's current clan. It contains AshKlan, Latin Knight, Sleepygamer53, QueenVendetta, Nayiby15, Jmz09, StandByWarShark, XxTigoon39xX, ICroatia4Life, ReplacedLemon0, AntiSkullCam, EpiclyJaica, FreedomAdam, Tsunamic Flower, and Herobrine V182. Old friends and new friends join LiveStorm. They are currently fighting the New Era of Coke and 117. [[Category:Players]]

{{Infobox|Box title = Iron Ace/Creep8|Row 1 title = occupation:|Row 1 info = Moderator (formerly), griefer|Row 2 title = weapon:|Row 2 info = diamond sword, TNT}} Creep8 was once a moderator called Iron Ace, but after 4 corrupt moderatos betrayed him, he becames Creep8
== History ==
=== As Iron Ace === As Iron Ace, Iron Ace was a dedicated moderator and was not afraid of testifying against corrupt moderators. Iron Ace was dedicated to the rules and was well respected. One day, while on an assignment with corrupt moderators Birdie, Mace44, Woodon and IronMan88, the 4 moderators betrayed him and beat him to near death. Ironman88 then spawned in creepers and left Iron Ace to die. The 4 then claimed he was killed by attacking creepers.
=== Becoming Creep8 === Iron survived, however, and after intensive gene therapy to resemble a creeper and renamed himself Creep8 and when he found out they got away with his betrayal, he vowed revenge on the 4 moderators.
=== Revenge === After 6 years of planning, Creep8 then proceeded to exact his revenge. Creep8 first target was Birdie by rigging his house with TNT, which Birdie set of after he stepped on a pressure plate. Mace44 was the second target and Creep8 ambushed and killed Mace44 with his diamond sword.
== Gallery == <gallery> download (29).png|Iron Ace download (30).png|Creep8 </gallery> [[Category:Stories]] [[Category:Players]] [[Category:Griefers]]

He prefers a bow over a sword and his highest killstreak count is 25, he doesn't like to play hunger games all that much. Although he may seem dubious to creative mode this player has 9 stacks of legit redstone, 5 diamonds, 40 gold (maybe butter whatever) 3 stacks of iron and 5 stacks of coal. This player prefers survival over creative because it gives him a sense of adventure and feeling. This player loves to play on easy or normal (mostly normal or hard) so he can have a sense of ninja and assassin. This player likes to spawn 4,000 zombies on hard mode and shoot them all with a bow with NO armor in a super flatworld. This user LOVES to hug creepers.
==Career== History of career: CTTF: As of The Month of May (NOTE: Creeperandiknow has played many other matches but these are the only two as of May 2013.)
MATCH 1
Team: Blue vs Team Red
Creeper's Team is Blue
Creepers Kills: 23 Deaths: 5
Red Kills Totaled: 526
Blue kills Totaled: 652
MATCH 2
Team: RED VS. BLUE (this will always be)
Creepers Team: Red
Creepers Kills: 11 Deaths 2
Red Kills Totaled: 231
Blue Kills Totaled 124
==AutoBiography== Creeperandiknow or Creeper Jr. for short was born in Teirm, of the year Beta 1.2_01. He was the only human out of his creeper family. He has no brothers or sisters since King Jasper XVI had rein over the land, Creepers parents and brothers and sisters were killed by King Jasper because of treason, for giving away his secret vault of no one knows what. And so, Creeper jr. decided to hunt down King Jasper for his actions. Even though King Jasper had an army and ships with cannons to get across the Sea of Vastness he knew that Creeper Jr. would catch up to him. Why? He knew that Creeper Jr. had taken part in the MAOBAS (Minecraftia's Association Of Bows and Swords) which is an asassination group that sides itself with allies that are against the Empire of King Jasper XVI. King Jasper did not know what weapons he had mastered over at the training academy but he knew he was very skilled with a bow. So as King Jasper set sail for a forgotten island that nobody in minecraftia had ever heard of, Creeper Jr. thought of a way to hide on his boat so that he could use a sneak attack to kill the king. The king however was not a favorite of his subjects so pirates usually tried to rob him of his ships treasury which held overwhelming numbers of minecraftia's finest valuables. King Jasper made a note of this and told his sea captain who in turn told his men to be on guard and to be ready for anything

revision.comment: Mercury7523 moved page [[Cyrannomat]] to [[Cyrannomat 2018]]: Temporary change within belonging franchise.
revision.text: #REDIRECT [[Cyrannomat 2018]]

{{Infobox |Box title = Cyrannomat 2018 |image = |caption = |Row 1 title = First Appearance |Row 1 info = "Planet Minecraft: Slave's Rebellion, Part Two" |Row 2 title = Last Appearance |Row 2 info = "Planet Minecraft: Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites" |Row 3 title = Portrayed by |Row 3 info = R. Flores (February 2018-June 2018) |Row 4 title = Succeeded by |Row 4 info = - |Row 5 title = Title |Row 5 info = Cyrannomat 2018 |Row 6 title = Created |Row 6 info = April 2018 |Row 7 title = Fate |Row 7 info = Destroyed, June 2018 |Row 8 title = Gender |Row 8 info = Neutral |Row 9 title = Affiliations |Row 9 info = Cyranno W. Kelbrid ​(master/creator), Cyrannomat 2017 (predecessor) |Row 10 title = Occupation |Row 10 info = Revolutionary |Row 11 title = Homeless, Minecraft |Row 11 info = Residence |Row 12 title = Years Active |Row 12 info = 2018|imagewidth = }}The Cyrannomat 2018, (rarely nicknamed as Red Steve or Red Kelbrid) otherwise 2018 or '18, is the persona of the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-webi.html Cyrannomat ]that was generated immediately after its upgrade in the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/planet-minecraft-webi.html Planet Minecraft] episode [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/slaves-rebellion.html "Slave's Rebellion, Part Two"] ​([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yt7eBNkz5TU&list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC&index=14&t=0s ▶️]).
Within the series' narrative, the Cyrannomat is the original clone of [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyranno-kelbrid-webi.html Cyranno W. Kelbrid], the founder and builder of Jamestown, a city which appears in the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cobc-webi.html COBC Gaming] Minecraft gameplay series [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/planet-minecraft-webi.html Planet MInecraft]. Shortly after numerous misunderstandings, the Cyrannomat turned against it's creator, and gained so much power that it was forced to upgrade to be able to survive. In the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/slaves-rebellion.html penultimate episode of the first season], the malicious entity morphed its memories and abilities with that of several internet stories and beings, including that of [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/tara-the-android-webi.html Tara the Android], and used its power to try to control Minecraft. ​The creator, Kelbrid, and his companion, [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/maiven-webi.html MaivenPlayz _], took it upon themselves to stop the clone before it could cause any harm.
The Cyrannomat 2018 had the ability to possess and control technologies and digital entities (such as Minecraft players). It was able to send Kelbrid to entirely different maps, teleported him through several points in the maps, and created portals that were able to do the same.
The Cyrannomat 2018 was destroyed in the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/season-1-pm-webi.html season 1] finale [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/kelbrid-vs-the-might-of-the-cyrannomites-webi.html "Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites"].
== ​Creation == [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyranno-kelbrid-webi.html Cyranno W. Kelbrid] created and designed the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-webi.html Cyrannomat]. Their creation is set to be explained in an episode of COBC Confidential.
== Physical Characteristics == The Cyrannomat 2018 retains its resemblance to its creator, [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyranno-kelbrid-webi.html Cyranno W. Kelbrid], from its predecessor's body, the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html Cyrannomat 2017]. Despite its given title, both versions of the Cyrannomat were conceived during January 2018.
2018's appearance was first seen in [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/slaves-rebellion.html "Slave's Rebellion, Part Two"]. It was significantly more gory after upgrade, but did not heal. The blood could, however, be a result of the uncleaned wounds that appeared on its predecessor's body in the previous episode. Their blood wounds are thick, heavy, and light. The most easily identifiable is the thick blood wounds, which are black (or dark red) in appearance.
Furthermore, '18 is covered in some type of gray and red suit, and wears a glass helmet. The red bits in the Cyrannomat's body resemble Redstone, a mineral which the Cyrannomat heavily uses is all of its appearances.
While in close proximity of it creation, Kelbrid discovered in the story "[https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/kelbrid-vs-the-might-of-the-cyrannomites-webi.html Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites]" that you can see through the helmet to get a better view of '18's head. It's entire body is bloody, and only its hands (and a small part of a suit) are left exposed. Alternatively, clones of 2018 are not wearing their helmet, exposing their head as well. Their hair contains a bald spot partially covered in blood.
The Cyrannomat cannot be killed in normal Minecraft gameplay. It can teleport between locations, and can seem to rise when respawning after being slain.
However, in the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/season-1-pm-webi.html season one] finale of [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/planet-minecraft-webi.html Planet Minecraft], once the Cyrannomat 2018 has accepted its ultimate fate, it's body begins to glow orange-yellow, and it's eyes begin to glow white. '18 is disintegrated when he is destroyed, and its body disappears altogether from the game.
=== Movement === Unlike, the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html Cyrannomat 2017], the Cyrannomat 2018 does not walk or run much. However, he has a tendency to menacingly move its head and body.
Additionally, the Cyrannomat 2018 was actually not able to move sometimes due to its redstone circuitry being damaged, as explained within its series.
=== Voice === The Cyrannomat 2018 is voiced by [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/r-flores-webi.html R. Flores]. His voice is run through a voice editor, which greatly changes his voice. However, his new voice is not as audible as it's predecessor's, and as a result, its voice was revised, and footage of the Cyrannomat recorded previous of this was re-recorded before being re-uploaded again.
== Development == Information on the development and story behind the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-webi.html Cyrannomat ]is set to be explained in an episode of COBC Confidential.
== Fictional history == ​The most disturbing episode that I’ve ever made so far. But like I said in the video: Don’t. Tell. Him. - Kelbrid, commentating on his most recent video at the time.
=== ''Planet Minecraft'' ===
==== Creation of the original Cyrannomat ==== [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html In January 2018, Kelbrid created a Minecraft player within the game], [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-webi.html which cloned his appearance], in the Jamestown city map. (This map was used as the setting for the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cobc-webi.html COBC Gaming] Minecraft gameplay series [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/planet-minecraft-webi.html Planet Minecraft]). Kelbrid originally intended for it to be an assistant to Kelbrid, however, shortly after, it gained sentience and independence from Kelbrid. It rebelled against him and gained so much power that he was forced to update himself to survive.
==== Update into the Cyrannomat 2018 ==== The entity successfully updated himself into a newer, and bloodier, self in the penultimate episode [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/slaves-rebellion.html "Slave's Rebellion, Part Two"]. Although it was never officially called this in the series, this new version of the Cyrannomat was separately cataloged and titled 'Cyrannomat 2018'.
The clone's update led to a massive fire within Jamestown. Additionally, it caused the footage taken for the episode to glow extremely bright. As the footage turned orange, the Cyrannomat 'faded' appearances into the newer form seen at the end of that episode.
==== First hours ==== The only 'regular appearance' of the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-webi.html Cyrannomat ]was the season 1 finale [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/kelbrid-vs-the-might-of-the-cyrannomites-webi.html "Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites"].
The multi-part episode begins witH Kelbrid realizing that his Jamestown residence has been partially destroyed as a result of the Cyrannomat's update. Kelbrid tries to fight the newly-updated Cyrannomat but is unable to due to several factors. After he cowers in the cave system underneath the city, the Cyrannomat follows and captures him. However, despite Kelbrid being cornered, the Cyrannomat becomes unresponsive, allowing Kelbrid to kill him. He comes to the conclusion that he's malfunctioning because his house had been destroyed in a fire which Kelbrid started before the clone had updated. The house included several redstone contraptions and when the house was destoyed, Kelbrid proposes, the redstone circuitry was damaged.
The Cyrannomat continues to malfunction throughout the ordeal, only barely able to operate every once in a while. Eventually, the Cyrannomat disappears from the map altogether, leaving Kelbrid to rant about how he's truly disappointed that this epic development had ended this way.
He proceeds to end the video, but he stops when he realizes that he's been sent to an entirely different world from Jamestown. This map only features a floating platform with large boxes made from polished diorite. Inside these are many things, such as mob spawners and portals.
Kelbrid is horrified that to find that the mob spawners are filled with sword-owning creatures resembling the Cyrannomat, which would later be revealed to be called Cyrannomites. When the spawners activate without warning, Kelbrid escapes through [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/oneblock-portal-webi.html one of the above-mentioned portals], which he theorizes were built by the Cyrannomat.
The smaller attacking creatures are able to fly through blocks, and while Kelbrid is gone, they are able to spawn in larger numbers. Additionally, when Kelbrid returns, a glitched variation of the Cyrannomat is discovered.
A box containing a temple of the Cyrannomat is discovered by Kelbrid, who has by then been joined by [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/maiven-webi.html MaivenPlayz _]. When Kelbrid messes around with the temple, Maiven is psychically-attacked by Cyrannomat. As a result, Maiven starts seeing visions of [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/tara-the-android-webi.html Tara the Android], a robot which, within the stories' narrative, was built by a serial killer and managed to somehow replicate itself on the internet. The Cyrannomat appears for a short amount of time, taunting Kelbrid and Maiven, before disappearing.
Maiven slowly recovers from the 'psych-attack', and discoverers a hidden level beneath the temple. The two venture there only to discover more redstone circuitry akin to those found on Jamestown. The hidden level has a terrible ambient noise which causes Maiven to want to leave. Just before they manage to leave, the Cyrannomat appears and attacks Maiven once more. This time, 2018 is accompanied by it's predecessor, the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html Cyrannomat 2017]. A horde of Cyrannomats engulf the pair as Maiven has more horrific hallucinations of Tara the Android.
Kelbrid manages to destroy the Cyrannomats and Cyrannomites, but the Cyrannomat 2018 captures and kidnaps Maiven. Kelbrid escapes to the outside world only to discover an Age of Discovery-like spacecraft hovering above the platform. Kelbrid manages to reach the spacecraft, but is devastated to discover that Maiven has been encased and converted into a Cyrannomat.
==== The Cyrannomat(s') new plan ==== The Cyrannomat 2017, the Cyrannomat 2018, and the Maiven Cyrannomat prepare to take control over Minecraft, but surviving memories of Maiven's Cyrannomat inspire the other two Cyrannomats to instead attempt to control the internet, as they know about the Deep Web and the Mariana's Web since Kelbrid had previously told Maiven about them.
'18 discovers through Maiven that the U.S. Government supposedly used the Deep Web, and theorizes that one way or another, the three Cyrannomats will be able to send their malicious consciousness onto the physical, real world.
Kelbrid contacts his previous [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/companion-webi.html companion], [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/abel-hernandez-webi.html 'Lil Abe] ([https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/abel-hernandez-webi.html Abel Hernandez], [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cubical-universe-webi.html Cubical Universe]), to have him quickly install a phone virus into his phone. Since the Cyrannomats originate from Kelbrid's Minecraft files and app, they are trapped in Kelbrid's phone. Without access to the internet, the Cyrannomat's hijack Kelbrid's phone in order to reconnect. Abel's virus, however, prevents this, and a Kelbrid instead uses a Cyrannomat Portal (filled with advanced code) against them. Kelbrid proceeds in his plan to disable the Cyrannomats by having him perform a simple task that would render the Cyrannomats useless. The process requires Kelbrid to change any numbers above '2' to '0's or '1's. However, Kelbrid is unable to work fast enough to keep up with the Cyrannomats. As a result, the Cyrannomat's connection to the internet is restored.
Maiven is released from the control of the Cyrannomats since she has been rendered no longer necessary. However, Kelbrid realizes that Maiven had previously borrowed an approved Google Play license from Kelbrid. Kelbrid has Maiven connect to X-Box Live and allow their world to be joined by anyone in the world. Maiven and Kelbrid call every member of the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/nixxons-alliance-webi.html Nixxon's Alliance], including Abel, [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/supertroll-webi.html Diego Reynoso] (Supertroll), and [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/mech-x-xavious-person-webi.html Mech-X-Xavious] ([https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/mech-x-xavious-channel-webi.html Mech-X-Xavious]), and have them join their server.
The increased amount of players allows the '011' task to be accomplished successfully. The Cyrannomat 2018 and Cyrannomat 2017, now permanently disconnected from the internet, are hacked and reduced to only Minecraft players once more. The Alliance work together to destroy all of the Cyrannomats duplicates and the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html Cyrannomat 2017], who is revealed to have just been an 'echo in the game'.
==== Ultimate fate of the Cyrannomat and Minecraft ==== All of the members of the Alliance work together to destroy the Cyrannomat 2018, the final survivor of the Cyrannomat species. Kelbrid, Abel and Maiven create a violent explosion on the platform world which destroys the Cyrannomat 2018. However, the almost infinite virtual power of the Cyrannomat 2018 keeps him from dying immediately, and instead, the Cyrannomat 2018 burns alive for a period of one minute. The death is so traumatic to the Minecraft game and code, that it is 'replayed' or 'replicated' on every one of the Alliance's Minecraft maps. The ultimate destruction of the Cyrannomat leaves all Minecraft maps with a gigantic crater, which is later repaired with help of the Cyrannomat Portal's code.
The Alliance is relieved to hear that the Cyrannomat(s) has been succesfully destroyed, and leave Kelbrid to rebuild Jamestown.
== Appearances == The Cyrannomat 2018 appeared mainly in the COBC Gaming Minecraft gameplay series Planet Minecraft. However, it has been scheduled to appear in other series' or works. *[https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/planet-minecraft-webi.html Planet Minecraft] **[https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/season-1-pm-webi.html Season 1] ***Part B ([https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC ▶️]) ****"Slave's Rebellion, Part Two" ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yt7eBNkz5TU&list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC&index=14&t=3s ▶️]) ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part One" ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m-F2lv_KKPY&list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC&index=15&t=0s ▶️]) ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Two" ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jd7MODLj6MM&list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC&index=16&t=6s ▶️]) ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Three" ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vzGPdOloZYU&list=PLyEl4OXPIVcKQQWx-NtfhjdmE_TJAC1hC&index=17&t=438s ▶️]) ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Four" ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Five" ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Six" ****"Kelbrid vs. the Might of the Cyrannomites, Part Seven" *Nixxon's Daycare **Season 1 ***Unspecified episode *Other **Audioplays ***"The Fate of the Cyrannomat"
== See Also == Alternate versions (or related characters) of the Cyrannomat 2018 include the Cyrannomat species, the [https://nixxons-alliance.weebly.com/cyrannomat-2017-webi.html Cyrannomat 2017], Max (otherwise known as the Cyrannomax), and the Cyrannomite species. ==References== *Kelbrid, Cyranno. {{Infobox |Box title = DKCraft |Row 1 title = IP |Row 1 info = mc.dkcraft.net |Row 2 title = Gamemode |Row 2 info = Survival/Semi-Vanilla |Row 3 title = Difficulty |Row 3 info = Normal |Row 4 title = Max Players |Row 4 info = 68 |Row 5 title = Website |Row 5 info = https://www.dkcraft.net |Row 6 title = Twitter |Row 6 info = https://twitter.com/DKCraftMC |Row 7 title =Discord |Row 7 info =https://discord.gg/0Y6ISZDOqxR1Yev3 |image = |imagewidth = }}'''DKCraft''' is a public Minecraft survival/semi-vanilla server. Originally hosted from xDeeKay's laptop, DKCraft was a private survival server created for his close friends. On December 16th, 2011 the server officially went live with dedicated server hosting and also begun accepting whitelist applications. On April 15th, 2012 the whitelist application process was removed and the server went public. ==Rules == These are the rules on DKCraft: # No griefing. # Be respectful to other players. # Use common sense. # Do not build any obscene structures or signs. # No excessive swearing. # English only in the chat. # Do not ask for ranks. # No mods except for Optifine and Shaders. ==Staff== {| class="article-table" border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 500px;" |- ! scope="col" |Username ! scope="col" |Role |- |xDeeKay |Owner |- |Tobieias |Admin |- |AltusClura |Operator |- |Jordy944944 |Moderator |- |BloodBro |Moderator |- |iamokmike |Moderator |- |Ravak |Moderator |- |CaptainWooper |Moderator |} == Ranks == *Guest: These players are new to the server. *Member: These players have singed up on the forum. *Trusted: These players have earned the staffs respect. They are active, helpful, and friendly players of the community. *Moderator: Moderate the server and its players. They undo grief and make sure players are following the rules. *Developer: Develops the servers specific code. *Operator: These players are experienced staff members, they are given extra commands to further assist the server and its players. *Admin: Manages the server and the forum to make sure everything is running correctly. In charge of the decision making. *Owner: He pays for the server and manages it along with its plugins. ==Plugins== * BanHammer * BetterAlias * BuycraftX * DiscordSRV * DKCore * dynmap * Essentials * EssentialsChat * EssentialsProtect * EssentialsSpawn * GAListener * GroupManager * LibsDisguises * LogBlock * LogBlockQuestioner * LWC * Minequery * PreciousStones * ProtocolLib * Votifier * WorldEdit * WorldGuard [[Category:Servers]]

{{Infobox |Box title = dcomando15 |image = File:MouthofSauron.png |imagewidth = 120px |caption = Current Skin |Row 1 title = Real Name |Row 1 info = Daniel |Row 2 title = Wiki Username |Row 2 info = DanGames |Row 3 title = Aliases |Row 3 info = --- |Row 4 title = Residence |Row 4 info = Yedikule (formerly)

Sky City|Row 5 title = Occupation |Row 5 info = Miner
Explorer
Harbinger |Row 6 title = Weapon of Choice |Row 6 info = Diamond Axe |Row 7 title = Nationality |Row 7 info = English |Row 8 title = Affiliation |Row 8 info = Dirty_Mallace
Mega Vega Mining Co.
DanCorp}} ==Biography== Dcomando15, an old adventurer, who bears many disguises, was born in unknown lands in the north, a land of everlasting winter. He soon travelled to a great plain, and found an ancient city called Yedikule. There, the lord of the land, tbohus, and his two advisors, rex1070 and jenright18, welcomed him to their fair city. There, he built a famous bar called Danny's Place. It served as a local inn, and a town meeting hall. After finishing construction, he and another citizen, Tama63, built the Yedikule Railway. Long before it was finished, however, a mighty fire burned the city, and it was abandoned. Soon after abandoning it, the remaining citizens of Yedikule travelled many leagues before founding a small city under the shadow of three great mountains. Dcomando15 went into a solemn state, and travelled into the wilderness a few miles away, where he lived in peace. He abandoned his solemn home after many years, and travelled a great many leagues across the water, before a pirate known as Preference sunk his ship, and jailed him. He broke out, and was invited into the ranks of Preference's pirates for his cunning. As soon as he was set off, he ran to a nearby city governed by a Moroccan, and built a house in the hillside. After an argument with a city official, he wired TNT across the city, and set it to blow. He picked up a companion, Dirty_Mallace, and blew the city, then ran to a band of raiders. The two of them built a home, and survived there for many years, before travelling to Mistral City. This was several years before the adventurers [[Honeydew]] and [[Xephos]] visited the city, even before Skylord_Jasper ''was'' a skylord. The duo split up, with Dirty_Mallace staying in Mistral City. Whilst in the gleaming city, dcomando15 made a friend, leonasta. They travelled many leagues to find the ancient dwarven city of Stoneholm, but could not. They, instead, took over an abandoned mansion and formed a guild, the Warriors. The mansion was destroyed later, and they moved to Skyfort Leon, a few miles from where the [[The Yogcave|Yogcave]] would be built. The skyfort, too, was destroyed, and so dcomando15 gathered his companions, and travelled to his old home, to find it in a damaged state. He founded the city of Malia, which was abandoned after the pirate Preference struck vengeance. With furious anger, his companions and he built Sky City, an enormous, stone city levitating in the sky. That is where he resides today. ==Appearance== The player currently walks around dressed as the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mouth_of_Sauron Mouth of Sauron]. ==Servers== *Miners' Union *UberCraft *Convicted [[Category:Players]]

'''__NOEDITSECTION__DoppelX''' is a resident of Minecraftia, with expertise in both the fields of magic and science and little to no battle skill.
==Background==
DoppelX had traveled all over the lands of Minecraftia, gaining knowledge from his experiences and developing machines that would help him in his endeavors. Over time he gained many cohorts that joined him in his travels, such as the brave pirate Squidnut and the mighty warrior JamezMF. They can typically be found transversing the lands in search of riches and anything that may be of some use them. ==Equipment== DoppelX can typically be seen wearing his "trendy" red-tinted visor, which provides him with a specialized HUD for everyday exploring and a "cloaking device" that allows him to disguise when in trouble. He also has a pair of specialized goggles that allow him to see things others cannot, but he tends not to wear them because he believes they are not "cool enough" for everyday use.
==Appearance==
DoppelX is a Caucasian man with brown hair and a slowly-growing beard. He typically wears his "styling" lab coat and red visor, but can also be seen disguised as other players. [[Category:Players]]

==What is The Dragon Park?== The dragon park is a zoo, but full of dragons. The dragons are peacful, but you can teach them to go in battle. ==Who Owns The Park?== COcelot does. Zoey even owns the dragons. She does own a lot of stuff,Including the [[The Sword of Kittens and Love]]. ==What are some of the dragons?== Simple dragons:
Win win dragon
Bad Smell dragon
Unusual dragons:
Sun dragon
Moon dragon
Rainbow dragon
Love dragon
LOL Dragon
More stuff coming soon! [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Fan Creations]]

Hello, I'm '''Dude10190'''. I create skins, make videos (don't have a YouTube lol), and host the [http://herobrinefans.forumotion.com Herobrine Fan Club] .
I will tell you about individual things ==Minecraft Business== The things I do in Minecraft are quite simple. Create skins, make maps, play servers, make videos. I don't really make videos about Minecraft, but when I get YouTube, I will post pretty often.[[File:Dude10190.png|thumb|Me]]
Of course, in the future, I will do other things. I will make a server, start modding, and become famous slowly over time. However, I need to be focused on Minecraft to do those things. Because I can't be doing a TSA project at the same time as a Minecraft video. ===Servers=== I don't usually play on servers. But when I do, I always choose my LAN server because there's too many advanced servers that are very popular.
I should say that a server called McGlowstone, which shut down a year ago, was my very favorite. It didn't have the usual "fancy" atmosphere, the spawn looked nice, but it wasn't 50 miles long, and the players had a good humor.
I'm also planning on hosting a server near the end of the summer of 2014. ===Skins=== I haven't been making skins that often. I usually keeps them secret. I'm good with choosing good colors and features for the skin, but I'm not a big fan with shading. This is Minecraft, not SuperRealisticCraft.
I hate skins that look stupid and unfinished. Stupid ones, I would say, would be a reworked Steve or a teenage girl. Unfinished would be... well... I can't describe it. ==Sites== [http://herobrinefans.forumotion.com/u1 Herobrine Fan Club]
[http://www.planetminecraft.com/member/pmc_dude10190/ Planet Minecraft] [[Category:Players]]

{{Infobox |Box title = Duker |image = image:bleh.jpg |Row 1 title = Name |Row 1 info = Duker (Also known as Duke or Dukah) |Row 2 title = Home(s) |Row 2 info = Duke's Beach House (Deleted), Duke's Mushroom House, Raider's Base (Destroyed), And Various other caves, canyons, and houses that I've lived in. |Row 3 title = Known For |Row 3 info = Protecting Dukerownsyou1 at all costs. |Row 4 title = Occupation |Row 4 info = Body Guard, Friend and Companion |Row 5 title = Phobias |Row 5 info = Doors, Water, Creepers, And Fire |Row 6 title = Affliation(s) |Row 6 info = Raiders, Peace Keepers, Dukerownsyou1 |Row 7 title = Offense |Row 7 info = Claws, Teeth |Row 8 title = Defense |Row 8 info = Growling, Running |Row 9 title = Generations |Row 9 info = 5}}
==The Beginning==
It all started in 1.7 When I tamed my first wolf. I hadn't had much interest in taming wolfs, Even though I started playing around 1.3 - 1.4. I ended up finding 4 more wolfs in the forest. Luckily I had a lot of bones. Soon after that I finished my beach house. Then I found some clay and made a pet store. (Don't ask why) I put 3 dogs in there and 2 in my house. I even started a dye collection, And I got some records. Then, Well things went bad... ==A Firery Disaster== Well, I had just gotten enough Obsidian to make a portal and I was planning on going to the nether. But being the Minecraft noob I amI put the portal right next to my beach house, Like right next to it. If you didn't know my beach house was made out of wood, so When I accidently lit it on fire everything went up in flames... Luckily I hadn't really started the process of moving my stuff in from my cave, So I only lost a bunch of dyes. Both dogs were incinerated, Or you could say cremated...
'''More Coming''' [[Category:Mobs]]

{{Infobox |Box title = Dukerownsyou1 |Row 1 title = Username: |Row 1 info = Dukerownsyou1 |Row 2 title = Preferred Weapon |Row 2 info = Iron Sword |Row 3 title = Affliation(s) |Row 3 info = Peace Keepers, Raiders, Warriors |Row 4 title = Things I hate |Row 4 info = Spiders, Iron Doors with pressure plates.|image = image:2012-06-30_13.08.16.png |Row 5 title = Occupation |Row 5 info = Miner, Farmer, Adventurer |Row 6 title = |Row 6 info = }} ==Hello!== I first played minecraft probably in 2010, around December. I really loved playing it, But now it only seems fun with mods or playing on multiplayer servers :(
==Peace Keepers== The "Peace Keepers" were created on a Pvp Anarchy server called Destination Imagination. The Original members were Dukerownsyou1, Naughtydax, And Creeping_Boom. Other Members were Aidanrogenes, Herb_The_Hero (Betrayed us, Killed by Aidanrogenes), And Zantoes1. The Peace Keepers had three bases. One right at the spawn. One on top of a mountain by the spawn, And one that is a bit farther away. All were destroyed. All other members no longer play on the server.

eagle_flame369 and Didimaki' s castle is a castle owned by the creeper Didimaki and his son, eagle_flame369. ==​Floorplan== ===​​​Ground Floor=== The ground floor features to rooms: the living room and the kitchen. To left of the front door when you walk in is the living room which has a sofa and a tv (made from a painting, wooden stairs, and signs) and a double chest. Accross the living room is the kitchen. The kitchen has a furnace and a crafting table. The kitchen also has a table (a fence and pressure plate) and chairs (wooden stairs). The stairs to the first floor are also included. ===1st floor=== The first floors only room is the bedroom. The left half is Didimaki's half. Didimaki's half has his bed, his private double chest, and a bookshelf. The right half is eagle_flame369's half. It again features a his bed, bookshelf, and private chest. However, it has a painting as well. Each half has an item frame. eagle_flame369's item frame has a piece of rotten flesh in it, whilst Didimaki's item frame has an axe in it. Each half also has a door to eather Didimaki's or eagle_flame369's private balconies. The stairs to the roof are also included. ===​Roof=== The roof features a door to the house, and also features blocks on the top of the walls that allow Didimaki and eagle_flame369 to shoot mobs with bows in between them. There is also a lookout on top of the doorway. Other than that, there is hardly anything on the roof. ==​Exterior== The exterior of the castle has cobblestone walls, which serves as interior walls for the first floor, but the interior walls of the ground floor at recessed behind the exterior walls. To the left of the castle is a farm, and next to the farm is one of the duo's mines ==​Inhabitants== *Didimaki *eagle_flame369 *Bowser (Dog) ==​Trivia== *The castle was built on Xbox edition, so eagle_flame369 logs in using his Xbox profile, MATTHEW. **However, the castle can't be seen, as Didimaki doesn't have Xbox live gold. *The castle was originally a house, but Didimaki expanded it and it became a castle. [[Category:Locations]]

Once, I, Mctalwolfer, got attacked by a user on Minecraft called Emperor Nuxlear. he wrote with bricks that he has a wicked plan to kill Herobrine. I don't know what it is, but I suggest to be careful of it.
==His Letter==
''Dear Minecrafter,''
''My name is Emperor Nuxlear, your hero and pleasure, but also your villain and worst nightmare.''
''Sorry for frightening you, but I'm not the Herobrine, I have just come here on the way to controlling Minecraft. If you help me kill the Herobrine and take over his throne in the Nether, I shall let you survive and I wont destroy your precious world. Nuxlear Inc.'' [[Category:Stories]]

[[File:WvGK9G5.png|thumb|336x336px]] Ender cobble is an enderman-player hybrid swordsman. His father was an enderman and his mother was a player.
== History ==
=== Early life === Ender Cobble was born to a player mother and an enderman father. Ender lived happily with his parents until he was 10, when endermen invdaded his home. His mother was killed on the spot by an enderman general and his father was arrested and executed by the same general. After that, Ender lived a hard life and was often seen as and outcast by other players. Ender had to steal to survive.
=== Learning sword fighting === At age 13, Ender was found and taken in by a player swordsman called Jerns. Unlike the rest, Jerns was caring to Ender and raised him as his own. Jerns taught Ender swordfighting.[[Category:Players]][[Category:Stories]]

{{Missing character Infobox |title1 = Endersteve|image1 = IMG 1996.JPG|caption1 = The other people of the village never knew what happened that night...|name = Endersteve|last_seen = 1 AM, 19th of May, 2012|where = Gravelville|hair_colour = Brown|eye_colour = Blue/purple|description = "A loud, creepy sound came from steven's house that night. I went to investigate but the house was empty. That's when I saw someone on top of the mountain. But they disappeared?" -witness|creepiness = Pretty dang creepy}}In a little peaceful village, Gravelville, something happened at night the 19th of May, 2012. A few people in town woke up to strange sounds coming from x_Steven123_x's house. A local witness named FrederikHartz says it sounded like two endermen wrestling while screaming. Steven, who lived in that house was never seen again, but security cameras in his house had recorded what happened. Steven was laying in bed, sleeping when an enderman teleported into his house and stared at him. The camera randomly went out for a few seconds and when it turned on "endersteve" was crawling on the floor in pain, before teleporting to the top of Gravel Mountain. In 2016, [[JordAxel]] found a few footsteps under the snow on top of Gravel Mountain. They are probably from endersteve, says ToxiCaz10, his neighbor from 2012. In 2018 an enderman with the shape of a player was spotted leaving behind something that looked like Steven's clothin, but there is no proof it's actually x_Steven123_x. [[File:Endersteve house.PNG|thumb|300x300px|x_steven123_x's house, place of the accident. With Gravel mountain in the background]] [[Category:Stories]] [[Category:Players]]

Endless Loop

[[User:Minecraft storyteller|Minecraft storyteller]] ([[User talk:Minecraft storyteller|talk]]) 09:50, April 15, 2015 (UTC)

I woke up at the middle of a cold taiga. I have no memory of what happened before that. But I had i felling that I need to get some wood. I have no tools, so I wanted to use my hands. I thoght it might hurt a little, ok maybe not a little. But when my hand punched the tree. It did not hurt, even a little.

[[File:Minecraft1.jpg|thumb|The cold taiga biome.]]  I needed some food, after punching so..... many trees.The animals were strange. The soulless eyes watching make my every move. Killed some of them, I thoght that a dead body would appear. But it disappeered in a cloud of white smoke. It also dropped strange floating 'Items' as I would call them.

I used the wood I found to craft wooden planks. I compressed the planks to make a table which I can craft tools from. I called it a 'crafting table'. I tried many times to craft a wooden pickaxe. After some time, i finally crafted a wooden pickaxe.It is alreddy noon when i crafted the pickaxe.i dug the dirt using my bare hands. I found some stone and started to mine it. I hope I can find some things that can be made into torchs. Tried it with wood, did not last for a hour.

I mined until it is almost sunset. I only get 35 cobblestone. I made a house quickly, I had a very bad feeling that something would get me if do not bulid a house in time. I crafted torches and place them in my house. Later, I heard the sounds of the 'mobs' wandering near my house. I have no place to sleep, so I better wait the night out.

It is sunrise, i can hear the mobs burning. I went out of my house, hoping to find anything new in this world. I came across a large cave.I finally saw the mobs. The green human-like mob is called a zombie. The mess of bones is a skeleton. The crawing black-brown mob with red eyes is a spider. I wish I can see new mobs that I can try to kill. I went back to my house. Crafted me a stone pickaxe, which is as same as the wooden pickaxe. Only I chaged the wood into cobblestone. I also crafted a sword. I went back to the cave, used my sword to slay them all.The spider droped thin but strong string and also its eye. Zombies drop flesh which smells nasty. It is rotten flesh. Skeletons drop bones.

I used my new pickaxe to mine more coal and I found a new ore. I mined it and it gave me the ore, unlike coal. I went back home, thinking how to smelt it. Thats it! I can craft a place where I can smelt or cook items. I smelted the new ore, got a shiny item. I named it 'iron' because it sounds cool

[[File:Xcalibur.png|right]]The '''Excalibur''', more commonly known as the Blade of Angmar, is a sword that has existed for thousands and years, since the forming of the Templar Order. According to legend, Notch, the creator of Minecraftia, sent down the sword with a mighty lightning strike. The first to discover it was Alexander Miguel Cross, a preacher of Notch and the ancestor of Josef Furnace (Daniel Cross). Alexander knew that it was his responsibility to spread Notch's word, and usher in a new world, a better world, that could be described only as a land of peace, freedom, and justice.
The Excalibur was passed down to the eldest son of each generation, with the exception of the son being lost, in which case it would be heavily guarded at the Strongold of Angmar until the son was found. Josef Furnace only found out he was the heir of Alexander Cross many years after he became part of the Order. Wielders of the Excalibur usually become the Grand Master of the Templars after they prove themselves worthy of the title.
The blade is said to have been forged by Notch himself deep in the Farlands, with unbreakable Bedrock and shining diamond. It ignites monsters when they come in contact with it, and peacefully lays to rest any mortals who are slain by it. Despite its endless power, it weighs no more than a feather due to an enchantment by Notch. When the Templar Order falls, the blade will catch fire and be sent into the End dimension, never to be retrieved again. [[Category:Weapons]] [[Category:Fan Creations]]

{{Infobox |Box title = Fancy Creeper |image = File:Creeper_in_Top_Hat.jpg |imagewidth = 175px |caption = A fancy creeper |Row 1 title = Hearts |Row 1 info = 14 |Row 2 title = Spawn rate |Row 2 info = 25% Chance |Row 3 title = Spawns in |Row 3 info = Level 8 or above light |Row 4 title = Weapons Required to Kill |Row 4 info = Diamond Sword |Row 5 title = Damage Rate |Row 5 info = 75% more than normal creepers |Row 6 title = Drops |Row 6 info = Gunpowder
Rarer items}} == Appearance== A Fancy Creeper looks the exact same as a creeper, but wears a tall top hat. ==Description== A fancy creeper spawns in light levels 8 or above, but is rarely seen in the Overworld. If you're (un)lucky enough to find one of these buggers, you'd best have a diamond tool! They are only injured by diamonds, and even then, they have 14 hearts. If killed, they normally drop rarer items that would be found in a dungeon, abandoned mine shaft, or deep below the surface of the Overworld. [[Category:Mobs]] [[Category:Fan Creations]]

{{Infobox |Box title = FatalKenshen |Row 1 title = Real Identity: |Row 1 info = Valerian Asura Arterius |Row 2 title = Known Alias: |Row 2 info = Michael Simmons, Demon of Trenzalore, The Dark One, Azrael |Row 3 title = Occupation: |Row 3 info = Blood Mage |Row 4 title = Residence: |Row 4 info = Trenzalore, Twilight Forest (formerly) Crystal Cove (currently) |Row 5 title = Revatives: |Row 5 info = Alastair Arterius (Deceased) Mysteria Arterius (Deceased) |Row 6 title = Affiliation: |Row 6 info = The Cult of Israphel |Row 7 title = Weapons: |Row 7 info = Swords, Bows, Arrows & Magic |Row 8 title = Powers & Abilities: |Row 8 info = Alchemy, Resurrection, Teleportation, Blood & Dark magic |Row 9 title = Species: |Row 9 info = Demon|image = file:FatalKenshen.png |imagewidth = 200px|caption = |Row 10 title = Status: |Row 10 info = Alive}} ''What's wrong with surrendering to madness, that's where the true peace is''                Michael Simmons aka Valerian Arterius is exiled demon originally from Trenazolore in the twilight forest, who left his dimension via nether portal to the world of Minecraftia, he is skilled in Blood Magic, alchemy and dark magic, which was the reason why he was exiled from the twilight forest for all eternity due to his misdeeds that he committed. ==Personality == Michael is neutral but malevolent, he is both skilled in the ways of combat and magic, he is able to craft tools to use at his disposal and knows how to survive the elements. Michael is skilled in Blood magic, enchanting, alchemy and architecture but he only knows the basics of machinery due to demons depending on magic and naturally resources while machinery not being one of them since they do not have the knowledge to create or use their complicated functions. ==Appearance == Michael is humanoid with some slight differences, he has dark grey skin, black hair. silver red eyes, sharp canine like teeth, pointed ears along with two verticle lines going through his eyes from his hairline down to his neck. His apparel is a dark and bight red coat with shoulder pads, black trousers, belt and shoes, and a white bandage scarf around his neck with two bandages hanging loosely down his back both marked with light grey verticle eyes.   ==Biography== Born and raised in the city of Trenzalore in the Twilight Forest, he lost both of his parents at a young age and was forced to live on his own, where he spent most of his time hunting and learning the ways of sorcery and alchemy, he became truly fascinated with the dark arts and eventually got caught during a incantation and exiled from the twilight forest for all eternity. He was sent to the world of minecraftia where he wandered the lands finding a suitable place to build a home in a in a hollowed out mountain side, quiet far from civilization which would shun him due to his appearance. he created many potions to hide his identity from the public eye and going under the identity of Michael Simmons, who lives with his parents on the other side of the forest. Upon his first visit to the nether, he encountered a pale faced man in a suit along with a zombie paladin and a humanoid creeper, the pale man was revealed to be israphel who offered Michael power and knowledge and allow him to indulge himself in the dark arts of blood magic in exchange to his loyalty to the cult of israphel and to follow his every command without question.  Michael was enticed by this offer and eventually accepted his proposal, israphel then ordered Michael to go to the jade sentinel and find out a way to revive them but Michael stated that his kind is not familiar with machines, which israphel in turn said that he can provide with some assistance with the matter and that israphel can put him to good use for his plans. [[Category:Players]] [[Category:Users]]

FeralG3 is a Minecraft player and Pvper who has been playing Minecraft for over a year. [[File:Y8f9VCt (1).png|thumb|411x411px]] Note: FeralG3 is my Minecraft username Note 2: I've recently switched to a new minecraft player caller FeralG7
== Description == I prefer to play on survival. I have a lot of different worlds and I'm a member of different servers. I have played minigames such as capture the flag. == Backstory[[Category:Survivior]] == '''Note: This is fiction, not fact''' {{Infobox |image = |imagewidth = |Row 1 title = Weapons:|Box title = FeralG3 |Row 1 info = Bow and diamond sword |Row 2 title = occupation: |Row 2 info = CEO of RCP, mob hunter, assassin |Row 3 title = Goal: |Row 3 info = avenge his family}} FeralG3 was born in a family of chickens, the youngest of 4 siblings. He was close his siblings White, Wings, Beak and Chick. At a young age, FeralG3's family was slaughtered by a zombie griefer called Maxo. FeralG3 was then brought up in an orphanage. At age 22, FeralG3 mined up a lot of gold and emerald ingots and used them to start his own business and became the CEO of RCP (Roastly Cooked Pork, a parody of KFC). FeralG3 also became a mob hunter and assassin. [[Category:Players]] [[Category:Stories]]

revision.comment: Created page with " [[File:017.jpg|thumb|312px|Fort Liberty]]Fort Liberty is the sight of a battle between the soldiers of the Overworld and the Nether Legion. The Overlord soldiers had been pushed..."
revision.text:
[[File:017.jpg|thumb|312px|Fort Liberty]]Fort Liberty is the sight of a battle between the soldiers of the Overworld and the Nether Legion. The Overlord soldiers had been pushed back to their last fort to defend against the Nether Legion. Fort Liberty was the sight of the last stand in the war for the Overworld soldiers. After 13 days of endless and intense combat the Nether Legion took the fort. After 200 years of the Nether Legion ruling the Overworld, the Overworld citizens rebelled and attacked the fort which was being used as the heart of the government. In the rebellion only one Overworld soldier perished. That man was Pvt. Herobrine who many believe still walks on the grounds of the Overworld with us.
At the fort conditions were very harsh. The soldiers were suited with leather armor and stone swords and bow and arrows. All that was offered for food was under cooked pork that caused sickness and fatigue to the soldiers.
[[File:018.jpg|thumb|286px|A view of the inside of the fort.]]As seen to the right the Fort was generally cramped. The soldiers had complained to their general but he did nothing about it. He instead thought winning the war was more important than living conditions.[[File:019.jpg|thumb|left|224px]] To the left is a view of inside the baracks. Typically the soldiers armed with swords would line up on the inside in a square formation. The archers would sit atop the guard towers and along the scaffolds that stretch around the fort, always visible to the soldiers who were laying in bed. [[File:020.jpg|thumb]]To the right is the scafolds that would be used by archers.
Fort Liberty is now known as a historical landmark and seen as a token of prosperity and perseverence by the people of the Overworld.
NOTE: The Nether Legion consist of anything that exist in the Nether in the current update for the 360 Edition or anything in the Nether in future updates.

{{Infobox |Box title = GenLawrence |image = File:GenLawrence_MC.png |imagewidth = 200px |caption = GenLawrence |Row 1 title = Real Name |Row 1 info = Unknown |Row 2 title = Minecraft Name |Row 2 info = GenLawrence |Row 3 title = Occupation |Row 3 info = Wikian, YouTube, Gamer, Head of Daggerpaine Industries |Row 4 title = Nationality |Row 4 info = American |Row 5 title = Known for |Row 5 info = Creating content in a multitude of applications.}}
GenLawrence is character of the wikian and YouTuber GenLawrence (Duh).
== Appearance ==
GenLawrence changes his skin from time to time, but his main one is a formal, almost militaristic skin.
===Body Features===
*His hair is a dirty blond, almost red looking. *His ethnicity is caucasian.
===Clothes===
*He wears a black long coat. *Blue button up shirt. *White cuffs *Black pants with a gold, militaristic looking stripe on the sides of the legs. *Black/Grey shoes
==Current Location==
He has been mainly seen building a townage called Black Diamond on the McPlayers Wikia.
==Servers== *Has been on the DisneyMC Server *Was/is one the multiple other servers, including the official McPLayers Wikia Server, where he is a mod. *Has his own, private server.
==Notes==
*Once in a while, GenLawrence makes videos about his adventures in Minecraft, and can be found on his [http://www.youtube.com/user/GenLawrence channel]. [[Category:Players]]

revision.comment: Created page with "==Story== [[File:New_Bitmap_Image.png|frame|A picture of goatfin.]]Goatfin was once an average Mincraftian. He adventured, he mined, he crafted. Until one day, he decided that..."
revision.text: ==Story== [[File:New_Bitmap_Image.png|frame|A picture of goatfin.]]Goatfin was once an average Mincraftian. He adventured, he mined, he crafted. Until one day, he decided that what he had done wasn't enough. So he built himself a city. Skyscrapers, supermarkets, you get the idea. Now he builds 24/7. One time he even built a complex Restone time machine. He actually became so obsessed with building, his present whereabouts are unknown... ==Trivia== *Since he has built a time machine, his disappearence could be related to that. *The arrow on his shirt could possibly symbolize something, like "Build from the ground up." *Reported sightings of goatfin are very obscure. **He was once said to have been seen by a minigame portal on a Bukkit server. **He was once said to have been seen near a player's house, but was gone in the next split second... **There are many more reported sightings. *Goatfin has a curl in his hair. *Though it has been said he has a city, it has never been found.

[[File:2013-07-13 10.38.49.png|thumb|400px|The Greeniehead in his natural habitat]] '''Greeniehead''' is a player in the world of Minecraftia who is a little obsessed with the color green. He is an insane green man who is very derpy and would do anything for emeralds.
==The Background of Greeniehead==
When Greeniehead was a noob in the world of Minecraftia, he was a pretty bad noob. He didn't know much but became very experienced in very little time. Although, he is not very good at redstoning but can figure out a few things if given enough time. He is a master of alchemy and knows all recipes for all potions and will sell them for a very fair price.
==Sightings==
Greeniehead has been sighted on servers such as The Noob Adventures Server as the alchemist for King Max, long ago on Stompzcraft before they banned him for no reason whatsoever, he has been sighted a few times on Childcraft and may be friends with the owner but this has not been confirmed, and once he was seen on xRpMx13's server but not for very long.
==Known Aliases== Greeniehead has been known to be called Greeniefish when he is swimming in lava using his specially brewed fire resistance potions, Greenie is the most common, and he is occasionally known by his real name which is not known at this moment.
==Known Friends== Greeniehead has been known to have made friends with many other players in the past such as Averageswallow42, Zuelatak(but have not spoken to each other in a long time), Biggerjohn, and one Meeblfallen. He has also been seen occasionally working with or against an odd one known only as Saladalas.
==Behavior== This weird player has been known as a very good alchemist and will sell items for fair prices. He will also buy emeralds at very good prices to the sellers. He makes all potions with all different effects and is a dangerous one to fight if he has a diamond sword and a strength II potion. Has been seen in PVP areas but then disappear, we suspect he uses his own brew of invisibility potions to mess with people because after he disappears people sometimes randomly get hit with swords and arrows.
==About Him== Real Name: Unknown
Race: Dwarven Greenman
Skills: Punching trees, Alchemy, and a few abilities with redstone.
Favorite Item: Emerald Blocks
Favorite Color: Take a guess
Favorite Potion: Invisibility Extended
PVP Style: Attack, drink invisibility potion, hold nothing, run, fire arrows from safe distance.(in that order)
Favorite Food: POTATOS (yes we know that's spelled wrong but that is how he spells it so that's how it will be done)
Favorite Minecrafter: Honeydew [[Category:Players]]

[[File:H20studios.png|thumb|His skin he made it and is available to download on the Skindex ]] H20studios is your average minecraft player for the most part. He also has an alt account known as WebOfNoTrust.
==Server Reputations==
He usually donates to servers that he likes the 2nd highest rank or the highest. He is quite a controversial topic in the Craft Gasm community, although he isn't admin on any servers, and had his own once. Currently he is working on making techno loops on Garage Band. He is also approaching into the trolling part of minecraft.
==PvP skills==
H20studios is not the best pvper and usually goes after noobs 1st. His favorite weapon to kill people with is a diamond axe that has sharpness. He currently is VIP on Super Craft Bros, and unlocked Butter Bro and is saving up for Witch. [[Category:Skinner]] [[Category:Players]]

[[File:Hidden.png|left]]The Halite Blade was an enchanted weapon used by the Great Necromancer. He used the weapon to almost conquer the world of Minecraftia, but when he was defeated and banished to the Nether, the weapon was smashed into pieces. Only two of the four blades was left intact, and it was sought after for many years. Finally, the young Templar Order discovered the blades at the dawn of their power, and since they were passed down the Cross family line along with the Excalibur.
==Reformation== Many years after Josef Furnace received the Excalibur, it was stolen by the Al Hashashin order. By the time it was retrieved, it was heavily damaged and smashed into pieces. Seeing taht the blade could no longer be used, he spent years collecting Halite fragments that remained from the destroyed Halite blade. Once all the pieces were found, they were combined with what was left with the Excalibur, making the ultimate weapon. It is used by Furnace today. ==Powers and Description== The current Halite blade is sea green and has a golden core from the Excalibur. It takes the shape of a sabre, and is very fast and efficient in battle. It still retains the enchantment from the Great Necromancer (AKA Herobrine), including the ability to summon lightning strikes and control ocean waves. It also ignites any monsters that come in contact with it, due to the fragments from the Excalibur. [[Category:Fan Creations]] [[Category:Weapons]]
#REDIRECT [[Halite]]

{{Infobox |Box title = Henos18 |Row 1 title = Occupation: |Row 1 info = griefer (formerly), moderator |Row 2 title = Weapon of choice: |Row 2 info = 'The griefer punisher' |Row 3 title = Location: |Row 3 info = METRO server |Row 4 title = Specialties: |Row 4 info = PvP, griefer identifying|image = |imagewidth = |Row 5 title = Age:|Row 5 info = 33}} Henos18 is a former griefer and is currently a [[File:Download (14).png|thumb|244x244px]] moderator on the METRO server == life as a griefer == As a griefer, Henos18 was responsible for many griefs in at least 40 different servers, and killed 500 players and 100 moderators in each of the 40 servers. Henos18 was therefore wanted in those 40 servers and the moderators in the servers were instructed to bring Henos18 to the admins, where he would be banned, though Henos18 was always able to escape the moderaters one way or another. Henos18 was known to use TNT and lava for his griefs and he used an iron sword enchanted with unbreaking III to kill the players and moderators. Henos18's partner was Miles Tunic
== Becoming a moderator == After many minecraft years of evading the moderators, Henos18 was captured by the METRO server moderators during a grief gone wrong, with Miles escaping, and was presented to the admins. The head admin, Simpleman376, gave Henos18 a choice, either face instant ban or become a moderator and in return, Henos18 would be pardoned of all the crimes he committed. Henos18 chose the latter, and was administered into the METRO server moderator academy, where he was trained by veteran moderator HarkerIron. Henos18 learnt how to remove griefers from a server when he killed them. Henos18 then graduated and became a moderator. Henos18 became a devoted moderator, and was considered the best moderator because he could use his knowledge as a former griefer to catch the griefers in the METRO server. He also became friends with a player called Coal.
== The Jacktheripper101 case == 2 years after becoming a moderator, a griefer suddenly appeared on the METRO server. Identifying him as [[Jacktheripper101]], the most wanted griefer for griefing a lot of servers for the past 13 years. Henos18 was assigned to lead a manhunt for Jacktheripper101. Henos18 became determined to bring Jacktheripper101 to justice after Coal was killed by Jacktheripper101. Henos18 tried to take him down, but he gave up after Jacktheripper101 disappeared. 8 years later, however, Henos18 was able to confirm that Jacktheripper101 had resurfaced, and 5 years after Jacktheripper101 resurfaced, Henos18 and Jacktheripper101 confronted each other on a bridge above a lava pit and engaged in a sword fight, ending with Henos18 setting Jacktheripper101 on fire with 'the griefer punisher, finally avenging Coal.
== A familiar face == At age 35, another griefer appeared in the METRO server called 'The Creeper' because he wore a creeper mask. 'The Creeper' then left a message saying 'Meet me at the place where you were captured'. After going there, Henos18 confronts 'The Creeper', who reveals himself to be Miles Tunic. Miles asks Henos18 to join him again, but Henos18 rejects him.
== Moderator weapon == As a moderator, Henos18 uses 'the griefer punisher' to replace his old iron sword
== 'the griefer punisher'[[Category:Players]] == 'The griefer punisher' is a custom-made diamond sword Henos designed. It has unbreaking III, strength II and looting II. [[Category:Stories]]

revision.text: HeroDestroyer generation 1 is a legendary robotic mob/player that a player saw on an SSP tekkit game. He is a cyborg, possessing various abilities. He is quite possibly the most powerful living thing in minecraft, a product of Herobrine meddling with tekkit. He is claimed to be seen rarely on SMP servers. ==Abilities== HeroDestroyer has many abilities, such as: *Laser cannons (his arms shoot bolts like arrows with flame) *flamethrower (his arm shoots a fiery blast that lights stuff on fire) *missiles (he rarely shoots missiles that act like TNT blasted by another block of TNT, but explode on contact and seek the targeted player *enhanced eyesight (can see the player, aim, and become hostile at the max range of chunk generation) *enhanced speed (faster than a spider) *enhanced strength (knockback 2-like punching) *machine gun (sort of like a high speed bow, but the arrows are infinitely fast) *can break blocks and has extrodinary redstone logic AI *super-tough (like, iron golem type) [[Category:Fan Creations]] [[Category:Mobs]]

{{ControversyLock}} {{Infobox |Box title = "Lord" Herobrine |image = image:Herobrine.png |caption = A picture of "him" |Row 1 title = Name: |Row 1 info = Herobrine (Persson) |Row 2 title = Occupation: |Row 2 info = Ghost Miner |Row 3 title = Nationality: |Row 3 info = Swedish |Row 4 title = Known for: |Row 4 info = Being a popular Minecraft meme and haunting miners. |Row 5 title = Family: |Row 5 info = Notch (Unconfirmed)|imagewidth = 150px}} "''...Only God can help you now.''"
-Herobrine, once he has cornered an innocent miner. ==The Story of Herobrine== Herobrine originated from the story and pictures of a miner, who brought it to the attention of the public. He stated he had spotted the character building strange tunnels and structures, and stalking him across the map. Herobrine first became ''famous'' when a few miners, who were doing a broadcast, staged a run-in with the mysterious man. Soon after, other miners began staging these run-ins with the mystic Herobrine. These were soon discovered to be hoaxes, until one miner confronted Notch, and asked if Herobrine was real. Notch pondered this thought, and replied "maybe." Miners were now sparked. At "Minecon 2011," Notch released Herobrine ''would'' exist. In several news patches, Notch announced Herobrine was gone. Many of Notch's colleagues have denounced Herobrine's existence, but it is unknown. ==Variations== *The stalker version of Herobrine is Notch's brother, who stalks the player, disappearing if approached. This variation is most likely derived from another internet creepy-pasta, Slenderman. *The miner version of Herobrine is a vengeful miner that tries to ensnare the player in traps, presumably to steal their items. He waits for people to enter his dungeons, then either seals them inside, or "teleports" behind them, presumably killing them. Some variations of this particular version says he breaks the player's creations, and steals their items from chests. In all versions, Herobrine is a human ghost entity, with the only variable being his intentions and construction abilities, or lack thereof. ==Gallery== Trolol.jpg|"...Only God can help you now." HEY!.jpg|Herobrine closes in on a Miner Herobrine.png|Herobrine's Skin

revision.comment: TheCreepy904 moved page [[Herobrine: The True Story.]] to [[Herobrine: The Story.]]: Making a fanmade story and saying it's "true".
revision.text:
[[File:Herobrine2.png|thumb|Herobrine. is he a troll or a guard?]] Herobrine is known as the ghost of Minecraft, the Lord of the Nether even. He is hated and feared by many, as the Lord of Evil in Minecraft. But is this so? Here is his true story.
'''Herobrine's first day.'''
Once, long, long ago, when Minecraftia was in his first year of life, two brothers were searching for diamonds. One was called Stebrine, the other was Herobrine. It was his first day. As they continued, Stebrine found an empty mineshaft. Exploring the mineshaft, they found much rotten flesh, bones, arrows, gunpowder and ender pearls. They also found the remnants of sticks, planks of wood, iron swords, and pickaxes. It appeared that a great battle had occurred. Exploring farther, they stumbled upon a zombie hoard, which they quickly destroyed. As they continued, they found that an army was amassing under the very world of Minecraftia, made of creepers, zombies, skeletons, and endermen. They tried to get out to warn Notch, but were captured by five endermen and were brought before the "Enderking" himself. He gave them a choice: join him or die. They chose their own choice: die fighting. Breaking out of their chains, they battled a hoard of endermen and pursed the Enderking and cornered him. However, in the ensueing battle, a wall was broken, and behind it was a lavafall, which destoyed the whole army of mobs. But the Enderking escaped, and cast a spell on Stebrine and Herobrine, turning one into the guardian of minecraftia, and the other into the god of war. And so began the eternal feud between the two. The god of war gained the powers of war, while the guardian was blessed with the ways of Justice. So, if you ever see Herobrine, think to yourself: which one is it?
[[Category:Stories]]

-Honeydew's memorable quote. ==The Story of Honeydew== Honeydew, an enigmatic Dwarf, was not actually born in Khaz Modan (though the witty Dwarf does try to enforce the rumor as much as possible) and was actually brought up in southern Minecraftia, in the Dwarf city of Dwergholme. Taller than most Dwarves, Honeydew quickly rose in renown in the city, as he developed his strength ever more, even claiming to his father that he had the "strength of moose". Being an adventurous Dwarf, Honeydew often travelled around the southland, deep into the deserts surrounding Dwergholme. Not much is known about the time in between His birth and his chance encounter with the spaceman [[Xephos]], but it is theorized that the Dwarf made friends with many of the tribes around the city, and the native Humans. After Honeydew had met Xephos, the pair moved north, to experience the cold, which was only fabled in the south of Minecraftia, and to live together in whatever abode they could make.
Taken from the [http://yogwiki.com/Honeydew Yogscast Wiki]. ==Appearance== Honeydew's "skin" is a Caucasian male-dwarf wearing a pair of leather trousers, gloves, and a single harness around his torso. He occasionally sports different wear, but that is what he normally wears. He has bright red hair, and a long beard. [[Category:Players]]

(no picture avalible)
==basic info==
Name: Howiewolf
Sex: female
Age: teenage (not saying real age)
== introduction ==
Hello! My screename is howie and I am a minecrafter. I currently play on the Xbox 360.
== how I got into minecraft ==
Minecraft came out in the 4th grade for me, and if you asked me what I thought on minecraft in the fouth grade, I would have said it was stupid and didn't make any sense. But in 5th grade, I got curious and started watching youtube videos about the game. Youtubers like Stampylonghead gave me a general idea of the vanilla game. Finally, I decided to download the free 30 min tutorial on the Xbox. Even though the game was only 30 minutes and I couldn't save my world, I still became addicted to the game and I played the tutorial over and over. I actually discovered that I was good at fighting the vanilla mobs and I constantly ventured into dark places to defeat mobs. Finally, I got the full game. My younger sister decided to buy the disk game for the family Xbox for all of us to play. I created my world, and I went right to making a stone sword and fighting various mobs. Then the classic minecraft story continues.
== my fursona ==
While playing the game, I started to develope a fursona, an animal who represented who I was in minecraft. I developed Howie, the female dire wolf who was good at fighting and had an army of wolves to fight with her. Her arch enemy is, (like any minecrafter) Herobrine.
== trivia ==
. I am currently not doing any multiplayer at the moment
. My first death in minecraft involved a giant sky island that I built and my sister telling me to jump off.
. My best building project is the front of my house, I spent a few days on it.
. My sister and I are building a hungergames map called Candycorn Landia
. Mooshrooms are the best

They killed Mega2098 for hunting
They also killed the Gemsbok [[File:Image-1429615147.jpg|thumb|220x220px]] [[File:Image-1429615111.jpg|thumb|220x220px]] [[Category:Mobs]] [[Category:Antagonists]] [[Category:Mob Stories]]

{{ImportanceLock}} ''This is a page based on the Minecraft player. If you are looking for his real-word equivalent, see [[Jens Bergensten|here]].'' {{Infobox |Box title = jeb_ |image = File:jeb skin.png |imagewidth = 200px |caption = The mighty jeb_ |Row 1 title = Real Name |Row 1 info = Jens Bergensten |Row 2 title = Minecraft Name |Row 2 info = jeb_ |Row 3 title = Occupation |Row 3 info = Right-hand man of Notch |Row 4 title = Nationality |Row 4 info = Swedish |Row 5 title = Known for |Row 5 info = Aiding Notch in creating Minecraftia}} ==The Story of jeb_== It is unknown where "jeb_" came from, but it is certain that without him, [[Notch]] may have never been able to form Minecraftia. He is credited with forming wolves, inventing pistons, and much more.
He often wrote the news patches, and performed Notch's day-to-day dirty work. In all senses, the residents of Minecraftia are indebted to the mystical guru.
==Appearance== Jeb_'s "skin" is currently an elderly Caucasian man wearing a dark tunic with a light shirt and trousers. He wears a wreath around his head, and has a cloak with the Mojang symbol around his shoulders.
He is rarely seen outside his mystical workshop, which no ordinary Minecraftian has ever visited. ==Notes== *Jeb did not actually ''invent'' pistons. It was originally a mod, which he greatly enjoyed, and added to the vanilla game. [[Category:Minecraft Staff]] [[Category:Players]]
